AgreementTableView.name: AgreementTableView
AgreementTableView.description: Layout for table-based list pages with page header, optional banner, filter bar, and data table

composition.childrenDescription: Main table content area

DocuSignShell.name: DocuSignShell
DocuSignShell.description: Application shell layout providing standard DocuSign page structure with header, optional sidebar, and content area

composition.childrenDescription: Main content area

localNav.description: Optional sidebar navigation props object (not JSX)

AIChat.name: AIChat
AIChat.description: Complete AI chat interface with messages, input area, suggested actions, and feedback controls

composition.childrenDescription: Complete chat pattern; config-driven via messages prop

AgentPanel.name: AgentPanel
AgentPanel.description: Resizable side panel for AI/agent interactions with optional split layout for chat and canvas content

DataTable.name: DataTable
DataTable.description: Production-grade data table with sorting, row selection, column control, pagination, and action bar

composition.childrenDescription: Data-driven via columns and data props

columns.description: Column definitions with header, key, cell render functions

actionBarContent.description: Custom action bar when rows selected

renderRowActions.description: Function to render per-row action buttons

FilterBar.name: FilterBar
FilterBar.description: Horizontal action bar for filtering and searching data tables with view selector, search, and filter controls

composition.childrenDescription: Horizontal action bar for table filtering/searching

search.description: Search input with value, onChange, placeholder

GlobalNav.name: GlobalNav
GlobalNav.description: Top-level application navigation bar for primary navigation

composition.childrenDescription: Config-driven header nav; pass as props object to DocuSignShell.globalNav

navItems.description: Nav items with id, label, href, active

LocalNav.name: LocalNav
LocalNav.description: Context-specific navigation for sections within a page

composition.childrenDescription: Config-driven sidebar nav; pass as props object to DocuSignShell.localNav

sections.description: Nav sections with items, collapsible headers

PageHeader.name: PageHeader
PageHeader.description: Page title header with optional AI badge and right-aligned action buttons

composition.childrenDescription: Page title bar with optional actions

AIBadge.name: AIBadge
AIBadge.description: AI denotation badge with optional clickable info callout for AI-assisted features

composition.childrenDescription: Data-driven via items prop with {id, title, content: ReactNode}

items.description: Array of {id, title, content: ReactNode, metadata}

Alert.name: Alert
Alert.description: Prominent status messages with optional actions

Breadcrumb.name: Breadcrumb
Breadcrumb.description: Hierarchical navigation trail showing current location

composition.childrenDescription: Data-driven via options prop

ComboButton.name: ComboButton
ComboButton.description: Button with dropdown menu of actions

composition.childrenDescription: Standalone date input with popup calendar

Drawer.name: Drawer
Drawer.description: Side panel that slides in from edge

composition.childrenDescription: Main drawer body content
Single trigger element (must be ReactElement)

items.description: Menu items with label, icon, onClick, children for submenus

FileUpload.name: FileUpload
FileUpload.description: Advanced file upload with progress tracking

composition.childrenDescription: Standalone drag-drop file upload component
ListItem children

Modal.name: Modal
Modal.description: Dialog overlay for critical actions and focused content

composition.childrenDescription: Modal body content

Pagination.name: Pagination
Pagination.description: Page navigation controls for large datasets

composition.childrenDescription: Standalone pagination navigation controls
Single trigger element (must be ReactElement, not ReactNode)

SearchInput.name: SearchInput
SearchInput.description: Input field with search icon and optional suggestions

composition.childrenDescription: Data-driven via steps prop

steps.description: Array of {id, title, description, icon, status}

Table.name: Table
Table.description: Data grid with sorting, selection, and custom rendering

composition.childrenDescription: Data-driven via columns and data props

columns.description: Column definitions with header, key, cell/render functions

actionBarContent.description: Custom action bar when rows selected

Tabs.name: Tabs
Tabs.description: Tab navigation for switching between sections

composition.childrenDescription: Data-driven via items prop with {id, label, content: ReactNode}

TaskCard.name: TaskCard
TaskCard.description: Composite card with header, body, and footer sub-components for displaying task information

Button.name: Button
Button.description: Primary action component with multiple variants

Icon.name: Icon
Icon.description: SVG icon component with 50+ built-in icons

Input.name: Input
Input.description: Text input field with various types

composition.childrenDescription: Single trigger element to hover/focus

Typography.name: Typography
Typography.description: Core typography system exporting Heading and Text components with consistent sizing and semantic HTML

Grid.name: Grid
Grid.description: CSS Grid layout with responsive columns

Portal.name: Portal
Portal.description: Renders children into a DOM node outside parent hierarchy to escape container overflow constraints

Stack.name: Stack
Stack.description: Vertical or horizontal flex layout with consistent spacing

AgreementTableView:6.content:

export type { AgreementTableViewProps } from './AgreementTableView';

props.name: pageHeader
props.description: PageHeader component with title, AI badge, and actions

props.name: banner
props.description: Optional Banner component for alerts, promos, or notifications

props.name: filterBar
props.description: FilterBar component with view selector, search, and filter controls

props.name: children
props.description: Main content area - typically a DataTable

props.name: paddingVariant
props.description:
Padding variant for content areas.
- 'default': 80px horizontal padding (standard Navigator layout)
- 'compact': 32px horizontal padding (narrower screens)

props.name: localNav
props.description: LocalNav configuration (optional - some pages don't have sidebar)

props.name: className
props.description: Additional className for the shell container

props.name: messages
props.description: Array of chat messages to display

props.name: onSendMessage
props.description: Callback when user sends a message

props.name: isLoading
props.description: Whether the AI is currently generating a response

props.name: showActions
props.description: Whether to show message actions (copy, etc.)

props.name: showFeedback
props.description: Whether to show thumbs up/down feedback buttons on AI responses

props.name: onFeedback
props.description: Callback when user gives feedback on a message

props.name: messageFeedback
props.description: Map of message IDs to their feedback state

props.name: onMessageAction
props.description: Callback when a message action is triggered

props.name: welcomeMessage
props.description: Custom welcome message when no messages

props.name: suggestedActions
props.description: Suggested actions to show in zero query state

props.name: suggestedActionsActionText
props.description: Action text for suggested actions header (e.g., "See all")

props.name: onSuggestedActionsHeaderClick
props.description: Callback when suggested actions header is clicked

props.name: suggestedQuestions
props.description: Suggested questions to show in zero query state

props.name: onSuggestionClick
props.description: Callback when a suggestion is clicked

props.name: maxHeight
props.description: Maximum height of the chat container

props.name: onShowHistory
props.description: Callback when history/menu button is clicked

props.name: onNewChat
props.description: Callback when new chat button is clicked

props.name: onMaximize
props.description: Callback when maximize button is clicked

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback when close button is clicked

props.name: renderMessage
props.description: Custom message renderer. Return null to use default rendering.

props.name: contextSource
props.description: Context source to display in input area (e.g., loaded agreements)

props.name: showContextAttention
props.description: Show attention animation on context source pill (ripple effect)

props.name: showInputAttention
props.description: Show attention animation on input container (ripple effect)

props.name: isStreaming
props.description: Whether AI is actively streaming a response (shows stop button)

props.name: onStop
props.description: Callback when stop button is clicked during streaming

props.name: disableAutoScroll
props.description: Disable automatic scrolling (for custom scroll handling in parent)

props.name: onInputKeyDown
props.description: Callback for input keydown events. Return true to prevent default handling (e.g., Enter to send).

props.name: showCanvas
props.description: Whether to show the canvas area

props.name: getRowKey
props.description: Function to get unique key for each row

props.name: selectionActions
props.description: Actions to show when rows are selected

props.name: renderRowActions
props.description: Render function for row actions (appears in column control cell, aligned with header icon)

props.name: viewSelector
props.description:
View selector element (typically a Dropdown with Button trigger)
Appears at the left of the filter bar

props.name: search
props.description:
Search input configuration
If provided, renders a SearchInput with the specified props

props.name: quickActions
props.description:
Quick action elements (typically IconButtons)
Rendered after the search input

props.name: filters
props.description:
Filters element (typically a Button or Dropdown)
Appears at the right of the filter bar

props.name: showSearchIndicator
props.description:
Show visual indicator on search input (like Navigator's blue dot)
Indicates AI-powered or special search capability

props.name: searchVariant
props.description: Search button variant - 'icon' for icon only, 'pill' for pill-shaped button with text

props.name: extraActions
props.description: Extra actions rendered before help/avatar (e.g., AI assistant button)

props.name: headerIcon
props.description: Header icon for collapsed state (defaults to 'plus')

props.name: onHeaderClick
props.description: Callback when header dropdown is clicked (only used if no headerMenuItems)

props.name: isLocked
props.description:
Whether the nav is locked open. When locked, nav stays expanded.
When unlocked, nav collapses and expands on hover.
Defaults to true (locked/expanded).

props.name: allowCollapsibility
props.description:
Whether collapsibility is enabled. If false, nav is always expanded
and lock button is hidden. Defaults to true.

props.name: footerToggle
props.description: Footer toggle for feature flags (e.g., "New navigation")

props.name: showAIBadge
props.description: Show AIBadge next to title (defaults to true)

props.name: actions
props.description: Optional action buttons on the right

props.name: infoContent
props.description: Info content to show in callout when clicked. Set to false to disable callout.

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the callout is open (controlled mode)

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when callout open state changes

props.name: allowMultiple
props.description: Allow multiple panels open at once

props.name: bordered
props.description: Show bordered variant (border-top separators) vs card variant (gap, radius, selected bg)

props.name: itemHeight
props.description: Header height: compact (8px), default (12px), tall (20px) vertical padding

props.name: displayLevel
props.description: Title display level for font size: xs (14px), s (18px), default (16px)

props.name: icon
props.description: Optional icon name from Icon component

props.name: customIcon
props.description: Custom icon element (takes precedence over icon prop)

props.name: rootIcon
props.description: Show home icon as first item instead of text

props.name: showCurrentPage
props.description: Show or hide the current page item

props.name: overflowMenu
props.description: Enable overflow menu - collapses to: Root > ... > Current (max 3 items)

props.name: onOverflowClick
props.description: Callback when overflow menu is clicked

props.name: width
props.description: Width variant: xlarge (640px), large (480px), medium (384px), small (320px)

props.name: enableArrow
props.description: Show arrow/caret pointing to trigger (Figma: enableArrow)

props.name: children
props.description: The text content of the chip

props.name: startElement
props.description: Optional element to display before the text (e.g., Avatar, Icon)

props.name: children
props.description: Main button text (ignored for tertiary which is icon-only)

props.name: startIcon
props.description: Icon to display in main button (required for tertiary variant)

props.name: compact
props.description: Compact mode (icon-only). Note: tertiary variant is always compact per Figma spec

props.name: error
props.description: Whether the input has an error

props.name: closeOnOverlayClick
props.description: Whether drawer can be closed by clicking overlay

props.name: closeOnEscape
props.description: Whether drawer can be closed by pressing Escape

props.name: customSize
props.description: Custom width (for left/right) or height (for top/bottom)

props.name: children
props.description: The element that triggers the dropdown

props.name: position
props.description: Position of the dropdown relative to the trigger

props.name: iconStyle
props.description: Show icons with background box styling

props.name: onFileChange
props.description: Callback when file upload status changes

props.name: onFileRemove
props.description: Callback when a file is removed

props.name: placeholder
props.default: Drag and drop files here or click to browse

props.name: dismissible
props.description: Whether the tag can be dismissed/removed

props.name: hoverable
props.description: Whether to show hover state on items

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback when modal requests to close

props.name: closeOnBackdropClick
props.description: Whether clicking backdrop closes the modal

props.name: closeOnEscape
props.description: Whether pressing ESC closes the modal

props.name: className
props.description: Custom className for the modal content

props.name: contained
props.description: When true, modal is positioned within its parent container instead of viewport

props.name: onItemsPerPageChange
props.description: Callback when items per page changes

props.name: maxPageButtons
props.description: Max page buttons to show (only in full mode)

props.name: content
props.description: The content to display in the popover

props.name: children
props.description: The element that triggers the popover

props.name: position
props.description: Position of the popover relative to the trigger

props.name: showArrow
props.description: Whether to show an arrow pointing to the trigger

props.name: size
props.description: Size variant - small (32px) matches button heights

props.name: onStepClick
props.description: Callback when a step is clicked

props.name: hoverable
props.description: Whether to show row hover state

props.name: responsive
props.description: Whether table is responsive (stacks on mobile)

props.name: showColumnControl
props.description: Show column control icon in header

props.name: onColumnControlSave
props.description: Callback when columns are saved from column control modal

props.name: initialColumns
props.description: Initial column definitions for reset functionality

props.name: selectionActions
props.description: Actions to show in selection action bar

props.name: actionBarContent
props.description: Custom content for the action bar (replaces default actions)

props.name: value
props.description: Number to display in the badge (1-99+)

props.name: dot
props.description: Show as a dot indicator instead of number

props.name: startElement
props.description: Show start element icon based on kind

props.name: variant
props.description: Background variant - light (white), dark (purple), or secondary (gray)

props.name: noPadding
props.description: Remove all padding from header, body, and footer

props.name: imagePosition
props.description: Image position when Card.Image is used - start (left side) or top (above content)

props.name: error
props.description: Whether the checkbox is in an error state (Figma: Error)

props.name: showLabel
props.description: Whether to show the label (Figma: showLabel)

props.name: showErrorMessage
props.description: Whether to show the error message (Figma: showErrorMessage)

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: Indeterminate state for partial selection (Figma: indeterminate)

props.name: startElement
props.description: Element to display before the label (Figma: startElement)

props.name: endElement
props.description: Element to display after the label (Figma: endElement)

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon name from the icon set

props.name: discrete
props.description: Discrete mode - only show underline on hover/active

props.name: external
props.description: Whether to show external link icon

props.name: kind
props.description: Whether the Progress Bar shows info or success

props.name: variant
props.description: Whether the Progress Bar is determinate or indeterminate

props.name: showLabel
props.description: Show the label and content of the Progress Bar

props.name: label
props.description: Label to display for the Progress Bar

props.name: content
props.description: Text at the end of the Progress Bar (percentage display)

props.name: showContent
props.description: Shows the content/percentage of the Progress Bar

props.name: size
props.description: Size preset (only applies to circular variant)

props.name: label
props.description: The label text for the slider

props.name: hideLabel
props.description: Hide the label visually (still accessible to screen readers)

props.name: description
props.description: Description text shown below the label

props.name: showValue
props.description: Show the current value next to the slider

props.name: startElement
props.description: Icon name to display as IconButton at the start of the slider (e.g., 'zoom-out')

props.name: endElement
props.description: Icon name to display as IconButton at the end of the slider (e.g., 'zoom-in')

props.name: onStartClick
props.description: Callback when start IconButton is clicked

props.name: onEndClick
props.description: Callback when end IconButton is clicked

props.name: width
props.description: Custom width for the slider wrapper

props.name: showLabel
props.description: Whether to show the label text visibly

props.name: kind
props.description: The status type/variant - color of the StatusLight

props.name: text
props.description: Text to display for the StatusLight

props.name: opaque
props.description:
Change the transparency of the StatusLight fill.
When false (default for neutral), uses semi-transparent background.
When true (default), uses solid/opaque background color.

props.name: children
props.description: @deprecated Use `text` prop instead. Optional text label for backwards compatibility

props.name: filled
props.description: @deprecated Use `noFill` prop instead (inverted logic). Show background fill

props.name: defaultChecked
props.description: Default checked state for uncontrolled component

props.name: label
props.description: The text label for the TextArea

props.name: hideLabel
props.description: Hide the TextArea label while allowing assistive devices to identify the control

props.name: resize
props.description: Control how the textarea can be resized

props.name: characterCount
props.description: Display character count when maxLength is set

props.name: allowOverLimit
props.description: Allow typing over maxLength (shows warning instead of blocking)

props.name: autoExpand
props.description: Vertically expand the TextArea to show all content

props.name: autoExpandLimit
props.description: Maximum height in pixels when autoExpand is enabled

props.name: text
props.description: The text to display inside the Tooltip

props.name: children
props.description: The element that triggers the tooltip

props.name: location
props.description: The preferred location of the Tooltip relative to its anchor element

props.name: alignment
props.description:
The alignment of the Tooltip along the edge of its anchor element.
For locations 'above' and 'below': 'start' = left-aligned, 'center' = centered, 'end' = right-aligned
For locations 'before' and 'after': 'start' = top-aligned, 'center' = centered, 'end' = bottom-aligned

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing the tooltip

props.name: children
props.description: Content to render in the portal

props.name: container
props.description: Container element to render into (defaults to document.body)

props.name: flexible
props.description: Use flex-grow to fill available space
